attributes.action: Nick Simon Augustine Knowles should get an MBE
attributes.additional_details: Nick Knowles is in I’m A Celebrity... Get me out of here, he has shown his love for other through many ways for example, having his personal item as a pillow so he can give it to anyone struggling to sleep, he also brushed of the bugs with his hat not his hands to respect the woman body.
attributes.background: Mr Knowles is a gentleman comanly know for his role on D.I.Y SOS: The Big Build. He is a true gentleman and deserves to have  recognition for his kindness. Nick puts people before himself and is always willing to lend a hand. The issue is that he has no formal recognition for any of this.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.  

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 

https://www.gov.uk/honours
